ygData.subject: Members
ygData.msgSnippet: I can also help to get the guild formed.  I can log in and be one of the 10 that are necessary whichever time you guys think is best.  My chat handle is
ygData.messageBody:
I can also help to get the guild formed. I can log in and be one of the 10
that are necessary whichever time you guys think is best. My chat handle is
Hamlet.

Rogues can wear banded ;) It counts as chain-type armor.

Clay

> -----Original Message-----
> From: wraven@... [mailto:wraven@...]
> Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 1:58 PM
> To: EQ_rainbow@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Guild
>
>
> From: wraven@...
>
> Well wednesday at 9:30pm EST is fine for me:) My chat handle is
> Lonewolf23 and I'll be thrilled to give you my support. My current
> character is Garret, level 7 Rogue on Brell. Been having lots of fun
> with him so far, I'm sure it'll be even better when the Rogue
> changes go live:)
> Also I'm working on getting better in Talioring, I've been wanting to
> check out the better forms of Leather Armour, maybe we could
> collaborate Christina since you have made Master (very
> impressive:). I dont think Rogues can wear banded, I dont
> remember:)
> Anyway I look forward to seeing you all on wednesday at the birth
> of our Guild, Unity sounds like a fine name BTW.
> Take care all and look me up sometime...
>
> Best wishes,
> Lonewolf
>
